citations.narrative:
On 10/17/24 a duck named "Helen" disappeared from her enclosure. The duck was never found. On 2/24/25, a duck
named "Sandy" was inadvertently left out overnight and most likely died of a predation event during the night. Her body
was never found or recovered. The only thing found of her was blood and feathers. Housing facilities must employ
security measures that contain all birds securely and safely. Failing to do so can result in the disappearance or predation
of the birds as in what has been documented in this case. Correct starting on 4/28/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.150(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
On 10/17/24 a duck named "Helen" disappeared from her enclosure. The duck was never found. On 2/24/25, a duck 
named "Sandy" was inadvertently left out overnight and most likely died of a predation event during the night. Her body 
was never found or recovered. The only thing found of her was blood and feathers. Housing facilities must employ 
security measures that contain all birds securely and safely. Failing to do so can result in the disappearance or predation 
of the birds as in what has been documented in this case. Correct starting on 4/28/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
